name: Gecad Technologies
tag_list: axigen, mail, server, mailserver, email, email-server, linux, messaging, groupware, collaboration
overview:
Founded in 2001, Gecad Technologies SA is part of a well established group of companies (Gecad Group) of 150 IT experts based in Bucharest/Romania, developing software solutions for the international market since 1992. After selling the IPR of RAV AntiVirus to Microsoft in 2003, a dedicated team with 12 years of experience in Linux messaging, security and support services shifted focus to explore new software businesses.

Axigen is an integrated email, calendaring and collaboration platform, masterfully built on our unique Linux mail server technology, for increased speed and security.

The Axigen messaging platform is available in three solutions, all tailored to customer needs:

  • Axigen Business Messaging The full benefits of email communication & collaboration, integrated in a smart & secure solution based on a powerful mail server for business.
  • Axigen Service Providers Messaging Multi-tenant messaging for SPs looking to host hundreds to millions of business-level email users, based on a powerful mail server for ISP.
  • Axigen Free Mail Server The Axigen Free Mail Server is a great alternative to open source: it is a turnkey messaging solution with an amazing number of free email users.

Currently, AXIGEN is distributed internationally by over 200 partners from 100 countries and manages email traffic for more than 11,000 companies with 6 million end-users.

milestones.description: Gecad Software is established, with the aim of researching and developing software products; in time, the company grows as one of the most respected local IT companies, gaining awards and recognition on the international market mainly through its RAV Anti
Gecad Technologies is established in order to provide software security consulting services.
RAV Antivirus sees an incredible global growth, reaching 150 distributors in over 60 countries. In June, Microsoft acquires the RAV Antivirus technology.

Gecad Technologies re-designs its business objectives and ventures into a new direction: a large part of the software security division staff takes over the challenge of developing an innovative messaging product, under the brand name AXIGEN.

The beta version of AXIGEN Mail Server is launched, in order to obtain feedback from users worldwide. During this testing period, over 600 specialists verify it, while it is constantly improved with added features.
The first commercial version of AXIGEN for all major Linux distributions is unveiled at LinuxWorld Expo, in London.

Six months after the official launch, AXIGEN has already concluded business agreements with 10 international partners from United States, United Kingdom, Germany, Mexico, the Netherlands and Romania and manages e-mail traffic for more than 200,000 mailbox
AXIGEN signs deal and is successfully implemented with the second largest HSP in Romania, Rol.ro (over 140,000 accounts and 700,000 emails daily).
The number of countries where AXIGEN has concluded distribution agreements rises to 28.

The German issue of Linux Magazine carries the first comparative review of AXIGEN; the review is highly appreciative and underlines several features, such as its well-structured Web configuration interface, as well as its professional customer support tea
The reputed ServerWatch.com also reviewed AXIGEN Mail Server and pointed out that it was â€œoffering turnkey advantages over open source solutions.â€
One year into the business, AXIGEN has signed over 30 local and international partnerships.
After a successful beta testing campaign, AXIGEN Mail Server 2.0 was officially launched. The number of distributors worldwide increased to almost 50.
As a result of the constant expansion of the client database, AXIGEN manages the email traffic on some 500,000 mailboxes worldwide
The AXIGEN partnership network expands to over 60 distributors worldwide. AXIGEN becomes SUN Microsystems Associate Partner.
Version 3.0 of the AXIGEN Mail Server, mainly addressed to ISPs, is commercially released.
AXIGEN closes a bilateral technological certification partnership with Avira GmbH.

AXIGEN Mail Server wins the ServerWatch 2007 Product Excellence Award for the Communications Server category. Version 4.0, including a Personal Organizer, is commercially launched. The distribution network reaches over 80 partners worldwide.
AXIGEN announces the launch of version 5.0 and the implementation of its messaging solution at Maktoob.com, the largest portal in the Middle East, serving over 4 million users.

AXIGEN announces a 2 million EUR investment from a consortium comprised of venture capital funds and technology companies, such as Global Finance and 3TS-Cisco Growth Fund III. The distribution network reaches over 100 partners in 60 countries.

Gecad Technologies closes a strategic technological partnership with Parallels resulting in an integrated AXIGEN Mail Server and Parallels Virtuozzo Containers solution for the Software as a Service business model.

AXIGEN releases version 6.0 of its messaging solution; the new mail server version is designed to effectively address the requirements of both collaborative enterprises and service providers offering hosting with added advanced collaboration services.
Gecad Technologies and Stimulus Software close partnership aimed to provide an AXIGEN - MailArchiva integrated solution.
AXIGEN Mail Server v6.1 is released. The new version introduces a Mobile WebMail Interface enabling users to access their WebMail account from mobile phones connected to the Internet.
The commercial version of AXIGEN 6.1 for Windows operating systems is released, bringing all the high-end functionalities of the AXIGEN solution to Windows users.

AXIGEN announces the launch of version 6.2, featuring Commtouch's Real Time AntiSpam Protection and many other important security
and delegated administration functionalities.
milestones.source_description: AXIGEN Releases New Version with Real Time Antispam Protection

milestones.description: Gecad Technologies and Hostway Romania sign a business agreement aimed at including hosted AXIGEN messaging services in Hostway Romaniaâ€™s SaaS offering.
Version 6.2.2 of AXIGEN Mail Server is released, featuring AVG AntiVirus and AntiSpam protection for Linux/FreeBSD.
AXIGEN Joins Microsoft's Empower Initiative for ISVs
milestones.source_description: AXIGEN Joins Microsoft's Empower Initiative for ISVs

milestones.description: AXIGEN becomes a member of the Intel Software Partner Program, with the intention to better adapt the AXIGEN Mail Server to Intel architectures.
milestones.source_description: AXIGEN Announces Technology Partnership with Intel

milestones.description: Gecad Technologies and Microsoft sign a patent license agreement that allows AXIGEN e-mail servers to directly synchronize e-mail and data between mobile devices utilizing Microsoftâ€™s Exchange ActiveSync technology.
milestones.source_description: Microsoft and Gecad Technologies Announce Exchange ActiveSync Patent License Agreement

milestones.description: Version 7.1 of AXIGEN Mail Server is released and brings iCal support and an improved Outlook Connector
milestones.source_description: Boost Business Productivity with AXIGENâ€™s Enhanced Collaboration Features

milestones.description: AXIGEN releases version 7.0 with Push email and PIM synchronization, LDAP & Active Directory synchronization, and a much faster and improved Outlook Connector.
AXIGEN 7.1.2 is released, featuring support for BlackBerry smart phones
milestones.source_description: Axigen Mail Server 7.1.2 brings your emails to your BlackBerry smart phone.

milestones.description: Axigen releases commercial version 7.1.3
milestones.source_description: AXIGEN Press Room - AXIGEN Mail Server 7.1.3 Is Now Available

milestones.description: Version 7.1.4 of Axigen becomes available, bringing a wide range of enhancements and bugfixes.
milestones.source_description: Axigen Press Room - New Axigen Mail Server 7.1.4 Released

milestones.description: Gecad Technologies announces the release of Axigen Mail Server 7.2 Beta featuring an innovative user-centric WebMail interface, based on the AJAX technology and revamped to provide users with a desktop-like experience and an overall optimized look-and-fee
milestones.source_description: The Cool Web Experience of Your Former Desktop Client - New Axigen WebMail, Ajax Powered

milestones.description: The commercial version of Axigen 7.2 is now available, bringing the new, desktop-like Ajax WebMail Interface.
milestones.source_description: Axigen Version 7.2 Released with Ajax-Powered Webmail Interface

milestones.description:
The commercial release of AXIGEN v7.3 comes to further emphasize the user-centric trend of our product by focusing on effortless
manageability and a higher level of security, through the introduction of a brand new Identity Confirmation system.
milestones.source_description: AXIGEN Releases New 7.3 Commercial Version with Identity Confirmation

milestones.description:
Axigen provides BlackBerryÂ® users with two-way over-the-air synchronization of emails, contacts and calendars via the AstraSyncâ„¢ client, as a
result of a technological alliance established with MailSite Software, Inc.

Axigen has released the new 7.4 commercial version of its integrated email, calendaring and collaboration platform. Axigen 7.4 brings an ever more mature and secure set of messaging solutions, under a new licensing model with free email users included.
milestones.source_description: AXIGEN Unveils New 7.4 Version & Licensing Model with Free Email Users

milestones.description: Axigen announces today the commercial release of version 7.5 of their integrated email, calendaring and collaboration platform. Axigen 7.5 raises the bar for email security and performance by featuring built-in Kaspersky antivirus and antispam protection,
milestones.source_description: Axigen Releases Version 7.5 with Top Level Security & Performance

milestones.description: Axigen announces the release of Axigen version 7.6, featuring new administration and automation tools, as well as the availability of an Instant Messaging service that can be accessed from the Axigen Ajax WebMail interface.
milestones.source_description: Boost Efficiency with Axigen Version 7.6 and Instant Messaging

milestones.description: Axigen Presents Itself as a Fully Grown Messaging and Collaboration Platform with Version 8
